channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Acclaimed playwright Tom Stoppard dies at 88
item.description: Tom Stoppard is remembered as a playwright whose wit and curiosity reshaped modern theater.

item.title: These Zika mothers went to battle — and their cry was heard
item.description: After the Zika outbreak ended in Brazil, many families faced a new reality: a child whose life was irrevocably altered after the mother contracted the...

item.title: Northwestern settles with Trump administration in $75M deal to regain federal funding
item.description: The university will pay $75 million over three years to end the Trump administration's investigations into antisemitism on its campus and to have mill...

item.title: A major winter storm disrupts travel as millions head home after Thanksgiving
item.description: The storm will spread through the Midwest and Great Lakes regions over the weekend with "widespread heavy snowfall and hazardous travel conditions," t...

item.title: FDA to raise hurdles for vaccines, faulting COVID shots for 10 kids' deaths
item.description: Food and Drug Administration officials say they will ratchet up requirements for vaccine studies, citing concerns about COVID shots for kids. But publ...

item.title: Ukraine hits tankers in Black Sea in escalation against Russia
item.description: The two ships stuck by drones were thought to be used to bypass Western sanctions on Russia.

item.title: U.S. airlines report short-term disruptions amid Airbus software issue
item.description: Airbus recommended an emergency software update to the A320 family of aircraft.

item.title: More than 70,000 killed in Gaza since Israel offensive began, Hamas-run health ministry says
item.description: Two young brothers were among the latest killed - reportedly in an Israeli air strike as the Gaza ceasefire remains fragile.

item.title: Trump officials and judge face off over flights to El Salvador in rare, high-stakes contempt probe
Investigators probe suspect's background in D.C. National Guard shooting
item.description: A National Guard member died in the wake of the shooting near the White House, President Trump said.

item.title: The Wiggles issue statement after appearing in Ecstasy music video
item.description: The popular Australian children's group says it "does not condone" drug use, after two of its members are shown dancing in a Keli Holiday video.

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (Nov. 30)
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: Venezuela calls Trump airspace closure warning 'colonialist threat'
item.description: US President Donald Trump said the airspace around Venezuela should be considered closed "in its entirety".

item.title: Trump to pardon ex-Honduras president convicted of drug trafficking
item.description: Juan Orlando Hernández was sentenced in the US to 45 years behind bars for conspiring to smuggle cocaine.

item.title: US halts all asylum decisions as suspect in shooting of National Guard members faces murder charge
item.description: The Trump administration has halted all asylum decisions and paused issuing visas for people traveling on Afghan passports in the wake of a shooting t...

item.title: Major winter storm impacts post-Thanksgiving travel for millions
item.description: Winter storm warnings and advisories extended from Montana to Ohio, the National Weather Service said. Forecasters warned there could be airport delay...

item.title: Venezuela says U.S. unilaterally suspended migrant repatriation flights
item.description: President Trump posted on social media that Venezuela's airspace should be considered as "closed in its entirety."

item.title: Winter storm warnings stretch across the northern US, bringing snow, cold and risky conditions
